name: Move-In Ready Push
description: Convert inventory browsers into immediate buyers with urgency-driven messaging and clear incentives.

steps.title: Configure Simulator
steps.description: Set up urgent timeline scenario with inventory-focused events
steps.action: Load preset scenario and adjust thresholds for quick move-in behaviors

steps.title: Generate Urgency Sequence
steps.description: Create 5-touch sequence emphasizing move-in timeline and limited inventory
steps.action: Use Drips Generator with inventory urgency template

steps.title: Adjust Lead Scoring
steps.description: Weight inventory-related behaviors higher for immediate follow-up
steps.action: Increase weights for lot views, brochure downloads, and timeline inquiries

steps.title: Test & Deploy
steps.description: Validate the complete flow and export configurations
steps.action: Run simulation, test drip sequence, export scoring config

name: First-Time Buyer Nurture
description: Guide hesitant first-time buyers through education and confidence building.

steps.title: Educational Foundation
steps.description: Ensure team understands key Aiglish terms for first-time buyer conversations
steps.action: Complete Glossary Lab focus on financing and process terms

steps.title: Educational Drip Series
steps.description: Build 12-touch educational sequence addressing common first-time buyer concerns
steps.action: Generate nurture sequence focused on financing, process, and confidence building

steps.title: Configure MarvelBot
steps.description: Train bot to recognize and address first-time buyer questions with empathy
steps.action: Add intents for financing fears, process questions, and down payment concerns

steps.title: Validate & Launch
steps.description: Test the complete educational journey and handoff processes
steps.action: Simulate buyer journey, test bot responses, validate nurture sequence

name: Luxury Buyer Acceleration
description: Fast-track high-value prospects with premium service and customization focus.

steps.title: Premium Scoring Model
steps.description: Configure scoring to prioritize luxury buyer behaviors and fast-track high-value leads
steps.action: Adjust weights for customization requests, premium lot views, and design inquiries

steps.title: Luxury Bot Training
steps.description: Train MarvelBot to recognize luxury intent and route to design consultants
steps.action: Add premium intents and configure immediate handoff for customization requests

steps.title: High-Touch Automation
steps.description: Create personalized sequence for luxury prospects with concierge-level service
steps.action: Generate premium drip sequence with design focus and consultant introductions

steps.title: Experience Audit
steps.description: Ensure website presents premium experience worthy of luxury buyers
steps.action: Run audit focusing on premium presentation and customization signals
